insanity.description: Physical hysterics or emotional outburst (laughing, crying, ect.
Babling, incoherent, rapid speach, or logorhea (a torrent of coherent speech)
Intense phobia, perhaps rooting investigator to the spot.
Echopraxia or echolalia (investigator does/says what others around him do/say)
Strange or deviant eating desire (dirt, slime, cannibalism, ect.)
Stupor (assumes foetal position, oblivious to events) or catatonia (can stand but has no will or interest; may be led or forced to simple actions but takes no independent action)
Amnesia (memories of intimates usually lost first; language and physical skills engaged, but intellectural skills absent) or stupor/cataonia
Severe phobia (can flee, but sees object of obsession everywhere)
Strange sexual desires (exhibitionism, nymphomania or satyriasis, teraphilia, ect.)
Fetish (investigator latches onto some object, type of object, or person as a safety blankey)
Uncontrollable tics, tremors, or inability to communicate via speech or writing
Psychosomatic blindness, deafness, or loss of the use of a limb or limb.
Brief reactive pyschosis (incoherence, delusions, aberrant behavior, and/or hallucinations)
Compulsive rituals (washing hands constantly, praying, walking in a particular rhythm, never stepping on cracks, checking oneâ€™s gun constantly, ect.)

phobia.name: Acarophobia
phobia.description: Fear of itching or of the insects that cause itching

phobia.name: Aerophobia
phobia.description: Fear of drafts, air swallowing, or airbourne noxious substances

phobia.name: Aeronausiphobia
phobia.description: Fear of vomiting secondary to airsickness

phobia.name: Agoraphobia
phobia.description: Fear of open spaces or of being in crowded, public places like markets. Fear of leaving a safe place

phobia.name: Agyrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of streets or crossing the street

phobia.name: Aichmophobia
phobia.description: Fear of needles or pointed objects

phobia.name: Amaxophobia
phobia.description: Fear of riding in a car

phobia.name: Amychophobia
phobia.description: Fear of scratches or being scratched

phobia.name: Ancraophobia
phobia.description: Fear of air drafts or wind

phobia.name: Anginophobia
phobia.description: Fear of angina, choking or narrowness

phobia.name: Anglophobia
phobia.description: Fear of England or English culture, etc

phobia.name: Angrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of anger or of becoming angry

phobia.name: Ankylophobia
phobia.description: Fear of immobility of a joint

phobia.name: Arachibutyrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of peanut butter sticking to the roof of the mouth

phobia.name: Astrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of stars or celestial space

phobia.name: Athazagoraphobia
phobia.description: Fear of being forgotton or ignored or forgetting

phobia.name: Autodysomophobia
phobia.description: Fear of one that has a vile odor

phobia.name: Automatonophobia
phobia.description: Fear of ventriloquists dummies, animatronic creatures, wax statues - anything that falsly represents a sentient being

phobia.name: Autophobia
phobia.description: Fear of being alone or of oneself

phobia.name: Basophobia
phobia.description: Inability to stand. Fear of walking or falling

phobia.name: Bathmophobia
phobia.description: Fear of stairs or steep slopes

phobia.name: Batophobia
phobia.description: Fear of heights or being close to high buildings

phobia.name: Batrachophobia
phobia.description: Fear of amphibians, such as frogs, newts, salamanders, etc

phobia.name: Bogyphobia
phobia.description: Fear of bogeys or the bogeyman

phobia.name: Catapedaphobia
phobia.description: Fear of jumping from high and low places

phobia.name: Cenophobia
phobia.description: Fear of new things or ideas

phobia.name: Chemophobia
phobia.description: Fear of chemicals or working with chemicals

phobia.name: Cholerophobia
phobia.description: Fear of anger or the fear of cholera

phobia.name: Cleithrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of being locked in an enclosed place

phobia.name: Climacophobia
phobia.description: Fear of stairs, climbing, or of falling downstairs

phobia.name: Counterphobia
phobia.description: The preference by a phobic for fearful situations

phobia.name: Cryophobia
phobia.description: Fear of extreme cold, ice or frost

phobia.name: Cyberphobia
phobia.description: Fear of computers or working on a computer

phobia.name: Cymophobia
phobia.description: Fear of waves or wave like motions

phobia.name: Cypridophobia
phobia.description: Fear of prostitutes or venereal disease

phobia.name: Deipnophobia
phobia.description: Fear of dining or dinner conversations

phobia.name: Dextrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of objects at the right side of the body

phobia.name: Dishabiliophobia
phobia.description: Fear of undressing in front of someone

phobia.name: Eicophobia
phobia.description: Fear of houses or being in a house

phobia.name: Doraphobia
phobia.description: Fear of fur or skins of animals

phobia.name: Doxophobia
phobia.description: Fear of expressing opinions or of receiving praise

phobia.name: Eisoptrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of mirrors or of seeing oneself in a mirror

phobia.name: Enosiophobia
phobia.description: Fear of having committed an unpardonable sin or of criticism

phobia.name: Eremophobia
phobia.description: Fear of being oneself or of lonliness

phobia.name: Ergasiophobia
phobia.description: 1) Fear of work or functioning. 2) Surgeons fear of operating

phobia.name: Erotophobia
phobia.description: Fear of sexual love or sexual questions

phobia.name: Erythrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of 1) redlights 2) blushing 3) the colour red

phobia.name: Gallophobia
phobia.description: Fear of France or French culture

phobia.name: Cheimaphobia
phobia.description: Fear of cold or cold things

phobia.name: Germanophobia
phobia.description: Fear of Germany or German culture

phobia.name: Gerontophobia
phobia.description: Fear of old people or of growing old

phobia.name: Glossophobia
phobia.description: Fear of speaking in public or of trying to speak

phobia.name: Hagiophobia
phobia.description: Fear of saints or holy things

phobia.name: Hellenologophobia
phobia.description: Fear of Greek terms or complex scientific terminology

phobia.name: Helminthophobia
phobia.description: Fear of being infested with worms

phobia.name: Heresyphobia
phobia.description: Fear of challenges to official doctrine or of radical deviation

phobia.name: Herpetophobia
phobia.description: Fear of reptiles or creepy, crawly things

phobia.name: Hierophobia
phobia.description: Fear of priests or sacred things

phobia.name: Homophobia
phobia.description: Fear of sameness, monotony or of homosexuality or of becoming homosexual

phobia.name: Hydrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of water or of rabies

phobia.name: Hygrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of liquids, dampness, or moisture

phobia.name: Hylephobia
phobia.description: Fear of materialism or the fear of epilepsy

phobia.name: Hypnophobia
phobia.description: Fear of sleep or of being hypnotized

phobia.name: Iatrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of going to the doctor or of doctors

phobia.name: Illyngophobia
phobia.description: Fear of vertigo or feeling dizzy when looking down

phobia.name: Isopterophobia
phobia.description: Fear of termites, insects that eat wood

phobia.name: Ithyphallophobia
phobia.description: Fear of seeing, thinking about or having an erect penis

phobia.name: Kenophobia
phobia.description: Fear of voids or empty spaces

phobia.name: Levophobia
phobia.description: Fear of things to the left side of the body

phobia.name: Lyssophobia
phobia.description: Fear of rabies or of becoming mad

phobia.name: Merinthophobia
phobia.description: Fear of being bound or tied up

phobia.name: Misophobia
phobia.description: Fear of being contaminated with dirt or germs

phobia.name: Monophobia
phobia.description: Fear of solitude or being alone

phobia.name: Mythophobia
phobia.description: Fear of myths or stories or false statements

phobia.name: Necrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of death or dead things

phobia.name: Nyctohylophobia
phobia.description: Fear of dark wooded areas or of forests at night

phobia.name: Nyctophobia
phobia.description: Fear of the dark or of night

phobia.name: Odontophobia
phobia.description: Fear of teeth or dental surgery

phobia.name: Ombrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of rain or of being rained on

phobia.name: Onomatophobia
phobia.description: Fear of hearing a certain word or of names

phobia.name: Paralipophobia
phobia.description: Fear of neglecting duty or responsibility

phobia.name: Parthenophobia
phobia.description: Fear of virgins or young girls

phobia.name: Peccatophobia
phobia.description: Fear of sinning or imaginary crimes

phobia.name: Phagophobia
phobia.description: Fear of swallowing or of eating or of being eaten

phobia.name: Phallophobia
phobia.description: Fear of a penis, especially erect

phobia.name: Philophobia
phobia.description: Fear of falling in love or being in love

phobia.name: Phonophobia
phobia.description: Fear of 1) noises or voices or ones own voice 2) of telephones

phobia.name: Pluviophobia
phobia.description: Fear of rain or of being rained on

phobia.name: Pnigophobia
phobia.description: Fear of choking of being smothered

phobia.name: Politicophobia
phobia.description: Fear or abnormal dislike of politicians

phobia.name: Ponophobia
phobia.description: Fear of overworking or of pain

phobia.name: Potamophobia
phobia.description: Fear of rivers or running water

phobia.name: Pteronophobia
phobia.description: Fear of being tickled by feathers

phobia.name: Rectophobia
phobia.description: Fear of rectum or rectal diseases

phobia.name: Rhabdophobia
phobia.description: Fear of 1) being severely punished or beaten by a rod, or of being severely criticized 2) magic (wand)

phobia.name: Scopophobia
phobia.description: Fear of being seen or stared at

phobia.name: Scotomaphobia
phobia.description: Fear of blindness in visual field

phobia.name: Siderodromophobia
phobia.description: Fear of trains, railroads or train travel

phobia.name: Sinistrophobia
phobia.description: Fear of things to the left or left-handed

phobia.name: Social Phobia
phobia.description: Fear of being evaluated negatively in social situations

phobia.name: Sociophobia
phobia.description: Fear of society or people in general

phobia.name: Staurophobia
phobia.description: Fear of crosses or the crucifix

phobia.name: Stenophobia
phobia.description: Fear of narrow things or places

phobia.name: Taphephobia Taphophobia
phobia.description: Fear of being buried alive or of cemeteries

phobia.name: Teleophobia
phobia.description: Fear of 1) definite plans 2) religious ceremony

phobia.name: Teratophobia
phobia.description: Fear of bearing a deformed child or fear of monsters or deformed people

phobia.name: Teutophobia
phobia.description: Fear of German or German things

phobia.name: Topophobia
phobia.description: Fear of certain places or situations, such as stage fright

phobia.name: Toxiphobia
phobia.description: Fear of poison or of being accidently poisoned

phobia.name: Tropophobia
phobia.description: Fear of moving or making changes

phobia.name: Xanthophobia
phobia.description: Fear of the color yellow or the word yellow

phobia.name: Zemmiphobia
phobia.description: Fear of the great mole rat
